text: Zero Wing is a 1989 Japanese arcade video game. It is the game where the popular meme based on a bad Japanese-to-English translation "All your base are belong to us" comes from. ==References== Category:1989 video games Category:Arcade games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Namco video games Category:Sega video games Category:Sega Genesis games Category:Scrolling shooters Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Zero Wing
